'Hybrid' (stylized HYBRID) is a role playing game created by "C". The "game" is
said to correctly model physical reality, and originated from a series of
"disjointed" posts by the author on a Usenet board. Hybrid consists of over 500
different and non-sequential rules, many of them utilizing references to pop
culture and politics, cross-references to other rules (existent or not) and even
other completely different RPG's, equations with undefined variables, and other
random content. The version numbering system is also non-sequential, version
0.21 is considered newer than 0.34. An RPGnet reviewer declared Hybrid to be
"unmitigated nonsense", and the game is also ranked as the 2nd worst RPG on the
site.
